name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior AI Engineer with over 10 years of experience in building scalable backend systems and strong expertise in **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask), **Go**, and **TypeScript**. Skilled in developing high-performance APIs, automation tools, and cloud-native architectures, utilizing **AWS** and **Azure**. Proficient in integrating advanced AI/ML solutions using frameworks such as **OpenAI**, **Hugging Face**, **Pinecone**, and **Weaviate**. Experienced in CI/CD processes and adept at utilizing testing frameworks like **Jest** and **Cypress** to ensure code quality. Successfully contributed to major projects at renowned organizations like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, leveraging strong communication and teamwork skills to drive collaboration and project success.
